mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_STYLE ( F_STYLE_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_STYLE_NAME, F_PARENT_STYLE_ID, F_COND, F_COND_PARAM, F_TEXT_COLOR, F_BACKGROUND_COLOR, F_BACKGROUND_IMAGE, F_BORDER_LEFT, F_BORDER_TOP, F_BORDER_RIGHT, F_BORDER_BOTTOM, F_BORDER_COLOR, F_BORDER_IMAGE, F_FONT_SIZE, F_FONT_FAMILY, F_LINE_HEIGHT, F_TEXT_ALIGN, F_VERTICAL_ALIGN, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ styleId }, #{ ownerProjectId }, #{ styleName }, #{ parentStyleId }, #{ cond }, #{ condParam }, #{ textColor }, #{ backgroundColor }, #{ backgroundImage }, #{ borderLeft }, #{ borderTop }, #{ borderRight }, #{ borderBottom }, #{ borderColor }, #{ borderImage }, #{ fontSize }, #{ fontFamily }, #{ lineHeight }, #{ textAlign }, #{ verticalAlign }, CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_STYLE SET F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }, F_STYLE_NAME = #{ styleName }, F_PARENT_STYLE_ID = #{ parentStyleId }, F_COND = #{ cond }, F_COND_PARAM = #{ condParam }, F_TEXT_COLOR = #{ textColor }, F_BACKGROUND_COLOR = #{ backgroundColor }, F_BACKGROUND_IMAGE = #{ backgroundImage }, F_BORDER_LEFT = #{ borderLeft }, F_BORDER_TOP = #{ borderTop }, F_BORDER_RIGHT = #{ borderRight }, F_BORDER_BOTTOM = #{ borderBottom }, F_BORDER_COLOR = #{ borderColor }, F_BORDER_IMAGE = #{ borderImage }, F_FONT_SIZE = #{ fontSize }, F_FONT_FAMILY = #{ fontFamily }, F_LINE_HEIGHT = #{ lineHeight }, F_TEXT_ALIGN = #{ textAlign }, F_VERTICAL_ALIGN = #{ verticalAlign }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) WHERE F_STYLE_ID = #{ styleId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_STYLE_ID AS "styleId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_STYLE_NAME AS "styleName", T1.F_PARENT_STYLE_ID AS "parentStyleId", T1.F_COND AS "cond", T1.F_COND_PARAM AS "condParam", T1.F_TEXT_COLOR AS "textColor", T1.F_BACKGROUND_COLOR AS "backgroundColor", T1.F_BACKGROUND_IMAGE AS "backgroundImage", T1.F_BORDER_LEFT AS "borderLeft", T1.F_BORDER_TOP AS "borderTop", T1.F_BORDER_RIGHT AS "borderRight", T1.F_BORDER_BOTTOM AS "borderBottom", T1.F_BORDER_COLOR AS "borderColor", T1.F_BORDER_IMAGE AS "borderImage", T1.F_FONT_SIZE AS "fontSize", T1.F_FONT_FAMILY AS "fontFamily", T1.F_LINE_HEIGHT AS "lineHeight", T1.F_TEXT_ALIGN AS "textAlign", T1.F_VERTICAL_ALIGN AS "verticalAlign", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_STYLE_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_STYLE_NAME AS "parent_title", T4.F_VALUE_ID AS "cond_title" FROM T_STYLE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN T_STYLE T3 ON T1.F_PARENT_STYLE_ID = T3.F_STYLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T4 ON T4.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 2 AND T1.F_COND = T4.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_STYLE_ID = #{ styleId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F_STYLE_ID) AS "maxStyleId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_STYLE T1
